detailsData.title: Independent Nationwide Specialist
detailsData.content: Capital Appellate Advocacy is an independent, nationwide appellate litigation boutique. It combines Big Law prestige, expertise, and experience with the flexibility of flat-fee billing.

detailsData.title: Pro-Business Focus
detailsData.content: The firm is pro-business, handling appeals for individual companies and writing amicus curiae briefs for entire industries. This focus ensures a deep understanding of business-related legal issues.

detailsData.title: Experienced Leadership
detailsData.content: Larry Ebner, the firm's leader, has a storied career in appellate litigation. He has been repeatedly recognized as a top appellate lawyer and has extensive experience in the U.S. Supreme Court and federal courts of appeals.

detailsData.title: Strategic Amicus Briefs
detailsData.content: The firm excels in writing persuasive amicus briefs. These briefs are used strategically to influence court decisions, drawing on Larry Ebner's expertise and experience in judicial advocacy.
